personal_info.summary: Full-Stack Developer with a strong passion for technology and problem-solving. Experienced in developing end-to-end applications with TypeScript, Angular, Ionic, Node.js, C#, Python, PHP, as well as working with SQL databases. Quick learner with a proactive approach to tackling new challenges and mastering new technologies as needed. Detail-oriented, self-motivated, and committed to delivering high-quality solutions in agile environments.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using C#, JavaScript, PHP, and Drupal, working across both frontend and backend to ensure full application functionality.
Implemented UI/UX designs for a complete website redesign, ensuring smooth integration and functionality while adhering to design specifications.
Focused primarily on frontend development, while also contributing significantly to backend functionality to create a balanced and effective application.
Implemented best practices in coding and design, resulting in a more efficient workflow and improved application performance.
Led a team of 4 as Scrum Master, facilitating Agile ceremonies and ensuring efficient project delivery within deadlines. Used Azure Devops.
Executed comprehensive test plans and test cases to validate application functionality.
Documented defects using Jira and communicated findings to the development team, contributing to improved product quality.
Assisted in the development of testing strategies that enhanced overall testing efficiency.
Implemented pre-designed mobile application interfaces, ensuring seamless integration with backend functionalities.
Developed backend features to support and enhance frontend functionality, improving overall application performance.
Integrated APIs to enhance application capabilities and improve user experiences.
Actively participated in user testing and feedback sessions, refining features based on user insights.
